add()
Generic add function
ato_table_type_global()
Helper function to set the global type of ATO tables
`$`(<ATO>)
$ Method to extract ATO slots directly
get_ani()
Generic to extract the ani slot as a table
get_dep()
Generic to extract the dep slot as a table
get_det()
Generic to extract detections as a table
get_det_dep()
A wrapper of get_det to extract detections for transmitters listed in the dep slot
get_det_tag()
A wrapper of get_det to extract detections for transmitters listed in the tag slot
get_log()
Generic to extract the log slot as a table
get_obs()
Generic to extract the obs slot as a table
get_tag()
Generic to extract the tag slot as a table
has()
Generic to check if an ATO has data in a given slot
init_ato()
Initiate an ATO
is_ato()
Wrapper for is(x, "ATO")
log_comment()
Log a new comment
log_event()
Log a new event
make_ani()
Make an ATO animals object
make_dep()
Make an ATO deployments object
make_det()
Make an ATO detections object
make_obs()
Make an ATO observations object
make_tag()
Make an ATO tags object
match_det_ani()
Match transmitters in the detections to the respective animals
match_det_dep()
Match transmitters in the detections to beacon/reference transmitters in the deployments
match_det_tag()
Match transmitters in the detections to the target tags
match_obs_ani()
Match animals in the observations to the target animals
match_obs_tag()
Match transmitters in the observations to the target tags
match_tag_ani()
Match animals listed in the target tags to the target animals
show(<ATO>)
Method to show an ATO
summary(<ATO_ani>)
Summary method for an ATO_ani object
summary(<ATO_dep>)
Summary method for an ATO_dep object
summary(<ATO_det>)
Summary method for an ATO_det object
summary(<ATO_log>)
Summary method for an ATO_log object
summary(<ATO_obs>)
Summary method for an ATO_obs object
summary(<ATO_tag>)
Summary method for an ATO_tag object
`table_type<-`()
Assign a new table type to the ATO
table_type()
What is the table type of this ATO?
